name: Almost Home Now
description:
A little girl finds herself having to walk home alone in the middle of the night.
The empty roads seem a tad more ominous than usual.

Control the protagonist in this 3rd-person fixed-camera horror game.
Navigate your way through 4 distinct-themed areas as they get progressively more disturbing.
At the same time, a stalker inches closer and closer.

Quiet residential streets...
Eerie park paths...
Creepy woods trail...
And just outside of the home, where things take an unexpected turn...

Can you make sure the girl gets home safe and sound?
